com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.store.legacy
Interface PathRegistry

All Known Subinterfaces:
FileStore
All Known Implementing Classes:
DBPathRegistry, FilesystemFileStore
public interface PathRegistry

Keeps track of the file paths of serialized objects or managed datastream content.

Method Summary
 String getPath(String id)
          Gets the path for the given id.
 long getPathCount()
          Gets the number of paths currently in the registry.
 void setPath(String id, String path)
          Sets the path for the given id.
 

Method Detail

getPathCount

long getPathCount()
Gets the number of paths currently in the registry.

Returns:
the number of paths.
Throws:
StoreException - if any problem occurs.

getPath

String getPath(String id)
Gets the path for the given id.

Parameters:
id - the pid or pid "+" datastreamId "+" datastreamVersionId.
Returns:
the path, or null if no such mapping exists.
Throws:
StoreException - if any problem occurs.

setPath

void setPath(String id,
             String path)
Sets the path for the given id.

Parameters:
id - the pid or pid "+" datastreamId "+" datastreamVersionId.
path - the path or null to delete the mapping.
Throws:
StoreException - if any problem occurs.
